mapper.insert: insert into pg_statio_sys_tables (relid, schemaname, relname, heap_blks_read, heap_blks_hit, idx_blks_read, idx_blks_hit, toast_blks_read, toast_blks_hit, tidx_blks_read, tidx_blks_hit) values (#{relid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schemaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{heapBlksRead,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{heapBlksHit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{idxBlksRead,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{idxBlksHit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{toastBlksRead,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{toastBlksHit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tidxBlksRead,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tidxBlksHit,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select relid, schemaname, relname, heap_blks_read, heap_blks_hit, idx_blks_read, idx_blks_hit, toast_blks_read, toast_blks_hit, tidx_blks_read, tidx_blks_hit from pg_statio_sys_tables
